CustomField.description:
Address Sequence Number
Customer address location for the receivable where the invoice was sent or where the customer correspondence may be sent.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Must be a valid customer address sequence number based on the FI$Cal Customer setup (e.g. 1, 2, 25).
If not provided, field will default from customer bill to primary address.
CustomField.label: Address_Seq_Num
